translation.en: All the food's gonna go bad.
Yeah, I drew up a list.

No, I gotta start over from scratch.

translation.en: see if they can extend my deadline.

你在开玩笑吗？ 他们一个下午

他们一个下午
就能用电脑做出一张烂海报

translation.en: they do it all the time, two big heads.

translation.en: I was just stupid, I guess.
Well, sweetie, you couldn't exactly know

translation.en: that a tree was gonna come flying through the window.

translation.en: get some plastic sheeting and duct tape
and seal this up before it gets dark, you know.
That was your grandfather's tree, the one he planted.
Oh! I used to play in that tree.
You know, we're safe, that's all that counts.

translation.en: Hey, Billy, take it easy, all right?

translation.en: The boathouse is all bashed. Holy crap!

translation.en: Sorry, Mom, but you just gotta come, come on.

对不起 妈妈
但你们过来看嘛 快点！
跟你说吧 灾难预言家来了 快点！

translation.en: How do you two always manage to make me laugh?

translation.en: You have incredibly low standards. Mhm.
All right, let's go see the damage.

translation.en: You mean the dead one I've been asking him
translation.zh: 那棵枯树 我三年前就叫他砍掉了

translation.en: to take down for three years before it finally blew over?
It really got smushed. You ain't kiddin'.
On the lake? We've had mist on the lake before.

-在湖上吗？
-我们之前也见过湖上的雾

translation.en: Coming off the mountain like that?

translation.en: Two fronts meeting, leftover from the storm?

亲爱的 我可不是气象员
带比利去把衣服换了吧

translation.en: I'll take him to town with me.
I'm gonna go have a little chat with our neighbor about his tree.

translation.en: Don't worry, I'm not gonna punch him in the nose.

He's gonna say "Sue me," which, I don't know, maybe we should.

他会说：“告我吧”
我不知道 或许我们应该告他

translation.en: Honey, one property dispute with this guy

translation.en: is enough to last me a lifetime.
translation.zh: 就足以让我郁闷一辈子

translation.en: I'm gonna ask for his insurance information.

translation.en: Turn on, full choke, pull five choke.
Just think we should trade insurance info, you know?

只是想我们应该
处理一下保险的事 你说呢？

translation.en: Oh, my insurance guy's gonna love me.

translation.en: I was gonna bring the station wagon, but, I don't know,

translation.en: the weather was so beautiful coming out of New York, I just...

translation.en: I'm sorry, man, I mean it.
That's nice of you to say.

-真高兴你这么说
-不 它本来是一辆好车

-真高兴你这么说
-不 它本来是一辆好车 我也不想看它那个样子

translation.en: I'll find my insurance guy's number, I'll bring it by later.

我会找出我保险员的
电话号码 晚点拿去给你

translation.en: Maybe we'll get our power back.
[Mr. Norton] That was some storm, huh?

translation.en: For a moment there last night
I thought we were gonna take off and head for Oz.

translation.en: From up the mountain? [David] Uh huh.
Any idea what they do up there?

translation.en: I'm sure you've heard the stories.
translation.zh: 我想你肯定也听过这些事

translation.en: Oh, sure. The woman at the laundromat says that

translation.en: they have a crashed flying saucer up there with frozen alien bodies.

他们发现一架坠毁的飞碟
里面有冻僵了的外星人遗体

translation.en: "Satan's Face Appears in Oil Well Fire".

要不你先去？
我去打个公用电话给史蒂夫

translation.en: Sure, if you promise to hold his hand, I guess.

translation.en: [Man] I'm sorry, I didn't know it was your sister.

translation.en: Yeah, well, half the staff didn't show, plus the power's out.

translation.en: Oh, no. What, no backup generator?

translation.en: Only to keep the food cold.
Everything else, welcome to the Dark Ages

translation.en: Hey, Thursday night, Steph and I wanna date night.

-帮忙看孩子吗？
-好 我会去的

translation.en: Everybody's stocking up, been like this since we opened.

translation.en: Eh, everyone's a little pissed off this morning.

translation.en: [Mrs. Carmody] With lines like these, I don't know how good it is,
translation.zh:
有这么多人排队
真不知道是好还是坏？

translation.en: but I guess we'll have to make do.

translation.en: Keep your head down, pal. I know it.

-埋头苦干吧 伙计
-我就知道

She could make a fortune in Manhattan with this handwriting.

你跟诺顿先生
要成为朋友了吗 爸爸？

Guess you're not mad at each other anymore.

Hopefully we'll have power up pretty soon.

-公交车30分钟后离开

How'd you hold up in the storm?
We had a tree come through the picture window last night,

诺顿先生的树倒在了上面

translation.en: That's what we get for not fixing that roof when we should've.

你可能会以为教育孩子

translation.en: would be more of a priority in this country,

花钱的地方去挥霍纳税人的钱

You men meet me back at the jeep in 5 minutes.

该死 老兄！

不行 我不能待在这
我得回家看我的孩子

-这是世界末日
-别说了 好吗？别说了

他说的对 咱们得保持冷静

抱歉 我不能就这样
呆在这 我得回家看我的孩子

translation.en: That could be a poisonous gas cloud.
Didn't you hear that man screaming?

translation.en: I agree, let's stay here until we figure it out.

我同意 大家都
待在这直到了解清楚为止

translation.en: Well, is anybody gonna help me?

translation.en: Ma'am, please. I got my own boy to worry about.

translation.en: I hope you all rot in hell.

第三个过道有医药用品
放松 小冠军 坚强点 坚强点

translation.en: Come on, you all right? I want Mommy.

-好了 好点了吗？
-我想要妈妈！

translation.en: All right, I know you do. Okay.
Just try to breathe, pal, it's okay.

他两岁之后
我就没见他这样吸拇指了

translation.en: She's new in town as of this semester.
Teaches 3rd grade, and the special ed kids
translation.zh:
教三年级 和那些特殊的孩子
因为现在莫歇尔退休了

和那些特殊的孩子
因为现在莫歇尔退休了

translation.en: She's wonderful, the kids love her.

translation.en: Lord, I'm babbling away like some old biddy at a tea party.

天啊 我就像
茶会上的老女人一样喋喋不休

translation.en: My nerves are jangled, I guess.
translation.zh: 我想我有些语无伦次了

translation.en: [Amanda] Why don't I get him some aspirin?

translation.en: He's calmer now, somebody gave him a Valium.

translation.en: I can't believe the way he ran in here.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信他跑进来的样子

translation.en: I need something to cover my boy up. You got any blankets?

我得找个东西
给孩子盖上 有毯子吗？

translation.en: Gonna keep checking on people, if you need anything, just holler.
translation.zh: 还得看看其他人 有需要 尽管喊我
我会的 萨莉 帮个忙好吗？

translation.en: Oh, I'd love to. I really should help him clean up.
translation.zh: 我很想帮忙 但我必须帮他打扫这儿

-我来吧
-好的 爸爸 别走

translation.en: No, I'll be gone two seconds, Big Bill. Come on, I'm gonna get your blanket.

不 我很快回来 比利
我只是去拿毯子

translation.en: Mrs. Reppler's here, and so is Mrs. Turman.
translation.zh: 瑞普勒女士在这里 还有土尔曼太太

translation.en: Don't worry, I'm not far. Okay?
translation.zh:
-好吧
-别担心 我就在附近 好吗？

translation.en: [Nortan] As soon as it blows away we can walk out of here safe and free,
translation.zh:
等它被吹散
我们就可以安全自由地离开了

translation.en: but we have to be smarter.
The first thing we need to do is keep our wits about us
translation.zh:
第一个我们要做的
就是要保持头脑清醒

translation.en: [Biker] Well, how we gonna do that, my man?

translation.en: We've got no phone signal, we've got no radio.
translation.zh: 这里手机没信号 也没有无线电

translation.en: [Nortan] I'm sure they're working on those problems as we speak.
translation.zh: 我相信他们正在处理这些问题

translation.en: It stands to reason that restoring communications
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 恢复通信

translation.en: [Nortan] It's obvious that we're in some kind of
translation.zh: （阿司匹林） 很显然我们遭遇了某种自然灾害
很显然我们遭遇了某种自然灾害

translation.en: [Biker] Ain't nothing obvious bout this sombitch from where I sit.
translation.zh: 在我看来 不那么明显

translation.en: [Ambrose] There ain't nothing natural about it either.
translation.zh: 依我看没有什么自然性的灾难
没错 这是审判日 它最终还是来了

translation.en: [Mrs. Carmody] It's Judgment Day, and it's come round at last.
translation.zh: 这是审判日 它最终还是来了

translation.en: There is nothing more obvious or natural than that.
translation.zh: 没什么比这更明显更自然的了

translation.en: by a life of sin and disillusion.
translation.zh: 就因为你们罪恶和毁灭的生活

translation.en: The generator? We're just gonna check it out.
No, no, I turned the generator off,
translation.zh: 不 我关了发电机了

translation.en: Nobody else heard that sound? What sound?
translation.zh:
-没人听见那声音吗？
-什么声音？

translation.en: I don't know, like a weird noise,
translation.zh: 我不知道 很诡异的噪音

translation.en: Like something was pressing against the door.
translation.zh: 就像有东西正挤压着门

translation.en: Did you hear it before the lights went out or after?

你听见那声音是在
关灯之前 还是之后？

translation.en: After, but look, I heard it, okay?
translation.zh: 你是之后 但我真的听见了 好吗？

-可听起来就是那意思
-不是的

translation.en: [Jim] No, no, no, no, now don't be that way, Mr. Drayton.
translation.zh:
-可听起来就是那意思
-不是的 别扯那么远 德雷顿先生

translation.en: [Jim] You had a scare, no doubt.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 你被吓到了

translation.en: Let's say we all go check it out.
Myron, go check it out. [Myron] All right.
[Norm] You get it running long enough to raise that door a little,

translation.en: I'll go out and clear whatever's blocking it.
translation.zh: 我去把堵着的东西清掉

translation.en: [David] No, no, you can't do that.
[Jim] Why not? It's an electric door, right?

translation.en: [Ollie] Well, yeah, but it may not be wise to send him out there.
translation.zh: 对 可是把他送出去也许并不明智

translation.en: No, look, it's not about who goes out there-
translation.zh: 不是 听着 这不是谁出去的问题

translation.en: [Myron] What, don't you think I can do it?
translation.zh:
-怎么 你觉得我做不来？
-喂！

translation.en: -[Norm] Hey, I want to go, it was my idea.
translation.zh:
-怎么 你觉得我做不来？
-喂！ 我想去！那是我的主意

translation.en: [David] Whoa, wait, wait, just stop, okay?

translation.en: Well, you don't seem to understand,
or you're trying real hard not to. This isn't an ordinary mist, okay?
translation.zh:
或者是你们不想明白
这不是普通的雾 好吗？

translation.en: You open that door and something gets in here-
translation.zh: 要是开了那门 就会有东西跑进来

translation.en: Well, like whatever made that noise I heard.
translation.zh:
什么都可能 能弄出
我听到的那种声音的东西

translation.en: Are you guys being willfully dense?
Mr. Drayton, you know, pardon me,
translation.zh: 德雷顿先生 你得原谅我

translation.en: but I'm not convinced that you heard anything.
translation.zh: 德雷顿先生 你得原谅我 但是我不信你听见什么声音

translation.en: I mean, we're not hearing anything now, right? Anybody?
translation.zh:
我们现在什么也
没听见 对吧？大家？

translation.en: Now, I know, I know, you're a big shot artist
translation.zh: 我知道你是个大牌艺术家 跟纽约

translation.en: with connections in New York and Hollywood and all that,
translation.zh:
我知道你是个大牌艺术家 跟纽约 跟好莱坞等
都有关系 但不要觉得优人一等

translation.en: but that don't make you better than anybody else,
translation.zh:
跟好莱坞等
都有关系 但不要觉得优人一等

translation.en: not in my book. Hey, I didn't say that.
translation.zh:
-至少对我来说不是
-我没那么说

translation.en: [Jim] Nor do I like being talked down to
translation.zh: 我也不喜欢被所谓的大学生

translation.en: or called stupid by a guy who went to college just 'cause he's got the jitters.
translation.zh:
贬低或称为笨蛋
仅仅因为他有些神经紧张

translation.en: Fellas, it doesn't even matter about the generator, the food will keep without it.
translation.zh:
各位 发电机不重要
食物没有它也能保存

translation.en: [Jim] Kid, I'm gonna start th motor, you raise the door,
translation.zh: 孩子 我来发动电机 你们把门抬高

translation.en: and you yell out when you got enough room.
translation.zh:
孩子 我来发动电机 你们把门抬高 -空间够了就喊一声
-好的

translation.en: You guys are gonna let this kid risk his life
translation.zh:
这简直是…
你们为了一台无关紧要的发电机

translation.en: over a generator that doesn't even matter?
translation.zh: 让这孩子拿他的生命去冒险？

translation.en: Would you just shut the fuck up already? [Ollie] Norm!
translation.zh:
-你他妈的就不能闭嘴吗？
-诺姆！

translation.en: [Jim] Listen, Mr. Drayton, I tell you what.
translation.zh: 听着 德雷顿先生 我跟你说

translation.en: The next time you got something to say,
translation.zh: 如果下次你有什么想要说的
先称称自己有多少斤两

translation.en: Because I'm sick to death of your bullshit.
translation.zh: 因为我对你的废话恶心得要死

translation.en: What am I, impugning their manhood or something?
translation.zh: 我怎么了 诋毁他们的人格了吗？

translation.en: Listen, they've lost their sense of proportion.
translation.zh: 听着 他们已经失去了分寸

-这到底是怎么了？
-在外面 超市那边

translation.en: Out there in the market they were scared and confused,
translation.zh:
-这到底是怎么了？
-在外面 超市那边 他们害怕且困惑
而在这 有他们能解决的问题

translation.en: in here there's a problem they can solve.
translation.zh:
他们害怕且困惑
而在这 有他们能解决的问题

translation.en: So, they're goddamn gonna solve it.
translation.zh:
他们害怕且困惑
而在这 有他们能解决的问题 所以他们拼死也要解决它
真的挺吓人 是不是 诺姆？

translation.en: What the fuck? Get it off, get it off!
translation.zh: 他妈的什么东西！弄掉它！

translation.en: Get this friggin' thing off me!
translation.zh:
他妈的什么东西！弄掉它！ -把这该死的东西从我身上弄走！
-弄掉它！

-把这该死的东西从我身上弄走！
-弄掉它！

translation.en: Help me, help me, help me!
What the fuck are you waiting for?
[Ollie] Hold him still! Hold him still!
But how the hell was I supposed to know what you meant?
translation.zh: 我想说 我怎么会知道你究竟是指什么？

translation.en: How was I supposed to know what you meant?
You should've said what you meant better.
I don't know, I thought maybe it was a big bird or something.
translation.zh: 我也不知道 我以为是大鸟什么的

translation.en: Did you get a good look at it, huh?
Did you get a good look at what you did?
translation.zh: 你看清楚你所做的了吗？

translation.en: Huh? [Ollie] David! Don't hit him anymore! -And you too! -It doesn't solve anything.
translation.zh: 大卫！别打了！于事无补了！

translation.en: Assholes! You got that kid killed,
translation.zh: 你们两个混蛋 是你们害死了他！

translation.en: and I got his fucking blood on me!
translation.zh: 而我却他妈的溅了一身血！

translation.en: Oh, God, oh, God, oh, God.
Hey man, we didn't twist this on him.
Yeah, he's a fuckin' kid. He's supposed to be stupid.
translation.zh: 对啊 他就是个臭屁孩 愚蠢活该

translation.en: Go back in the market, stay by the door.
translation.zh: 回到店里 守在门口
什么也别说 对谁都别说

translation.en: [Ollie] David? Need a little light here.
The people in the market, we have to stop them from going outside.
translation.zh:
超市里的人
我们不能让他们再出去了

translation.en: I'm not sure I believe it, I was here.
translation.zh: 我都不确定这是真的 哪怕我就在这
我们所看到的根本难以想象
你知道的 不是吗？ 我是说…

translation.en: I mean, what do we say?
Ollie, what the hell were those tentacles even attached to?

奥利 那些该死的触腕
到底是长在什么东西上？

translation.en: Oh my god. Are you all right?
Shh, shh, shh. Yeah, yeah, yeah, it's not my blood, I'm fine.

translation.en: I'll explain. Give me a minute, okay?
translation.zh: 我会解释的 等一下 行吗？

translation.en: I need to deal with something first.
I can't let Billy see me like this, he's scared enough.
translation.zh:
我不能让比利
看到这些 他已经够害怕的了

translation.en: Just give me a minute, keep him distracted. Okay?
translation.zh: 给我一分钟 让他别注意到 好吗？

translation.en: [jim] Hey, look. I'm sorry about Norm.
translation.zh: 关于诺姆的事我很抱歉

translation.en: I mean, I ain't making excuses, I'm just saying.

translation.en: Look, we need to tell people. We don't need to say how it went down
translation.zh:
听着 我们得告诉其他人
没必要说事情是怎么发生的

translation.en: or anything like that, but we're in the deep shit here,
translation.zh:
或者类似细节
但要说我们现在身处险境

translation.en: [Myron] What about the out of towners?
We've got plenty of them in the store. Where do we even start?
translation.zh:
我们店里有很多
外地人 我们怎么开始？

translation.en: He's an important attorney in New York.
translation.zh: 他可是纽约重量级的大律师

translation.en: That fella could be on the bench one day.
translation.zh: 总有一天会成为法官的

translation.en: Counts a lot for people in this town, or anywhere.
We've gotta discuss how we're gonna stop that thing getting in here.
translation.zh:
我们还得研究一下
如何阻止那东西进来店里

translation.en: Wait, what do you mean getting in?
translation.zh: 等下 你说进来是什么意思？
已经把卸货仓的门关了

translation.en: Yeah, but the entire front of the store is plate glass.
translation.zh: 但是整个店的正面都是玻璃
我正想你去哪了呢 听着

translation.en: That guy who came in here with the bloody nose.
translation.zh: 那个进来的人 鼻子流血的那位
他们… 我们看到了触角

translation.en: It ain't going very well, is it?

translation.zh: 抱歉 我还没有那么笨

translation.en: I mean, what do you take me for?
translation.zh: 我是说 你把我当成什么？
我很震惊 这真的很恶劣

translation.en: using what's happening here to try to make me look like an idiot.
translation.zh:
利用刚刚发生的一切
想让我看起来像个白痴

translation.en: No, no, no, that's not what's going on here.
translation.zh: 不是 事情不是你想的那样

translation.en: Look, come back to the loading dock, okay?
translation.zh: 跟我去储物仓 好吗？我指给你看
跟我去储物仓 好吗？我指给你看 血

translation.en: Blood, and a chuck of tentacle on the floor. No.
translation.zh:
-一大条触腕就在地板上
-不是

translation.en: No, what do you mean no?
We've got real problems to deal with here,
translation.zh: 不是 我们还有真正要紧的事得处理

translation.en: and this pathetic attempt at a joke
Mr. Norton. What reason could we possibly have-
translation.zh: 诺顿先生 要什么理由才能让我们

translation.en: This is payback for the lawsuit that I filed against him last year,
translation.zh: 这是我去年对他提起诉讼的报复

translation.en: and you guys are backing him up.
You wanted to humiliate me some more.
Show me a rubber snake while these hicks stand around laughing their asses off.
translation.zh:
给我看一条橡皮蛇 而这些
这些乡巴佬会站在那笑得前仰后翻

translation.en: Watch who you're calling a hick. Myron, Myron, Myron!
Mr. Norton, I swear. You've got us all wrong.
You're not too crazy about out of towners, are ya?
translation.zh: 你不太喜欢外地人 对吧？

translation.en: I only spend my money and I pay my taxes here,
translation.zh: 我只是在这里花钱和缴税

translation.en: and I've seen you talking behind my back.
translation.zh: 而我知道你在背后议论我

translation.en: I actually thought you were being kind to me today.
translation.zh: 今天我真的以为你对我很友好

translation.en: Well, thanks for setting me straight.
translation.zh: 还有 谢谢你载我出来

translation.en: And I'm glad that tree fell on your boathouse, you know that?
translation.zh:
而且我真高兴那棵树
砸到你的船屋上 知道吗？

translation.en: Glad. Smashed it in pretty good, didn't it? Fantastic.
translation.zh:
很高兴 砸的太漂亮了
不是吗？超爽

translation.en: Now all of y'all, just stay out of my way-
I know you're scared, man. I'm scared too.
translation.zh: 我知道你吓坏了 老兄 我也害怕

translation.en: Lives are at stake around here.
translation.zh:
-这里的大家生命都岌岌可危
-大卫…

translation.en: -David, I- -Okay, my son's life. Now, I need you.

translation.en: Brent, please, get your head out of your ass.

translation.en: All right? I'll drag you back there if I have to. Come here.

好吧 我会硬拖你过去的
如果必须这样的话 过来吧

translation.en: -David, get your- -No, I need- Get your God damn hands off of me!
translation.zh: 大卫 把你的手放开！

-打住！
-我会再次起诉你这混蛋的！

translation.en: And this time you'll go to jail.

translation.en: He assaulted me. You were witness to it.

translation.en: This man's crazy, he's crazy. No.
translation.zh:
-这人简直疯了 他疯了
-不是

translation.en: He isn't. I wish he was, but he isn't.
translation.zh: 他没疯 我真希望他疯了 可他没有

translation.en: Everyone in the store. You want to come back here?

translation.en: There's something that you need to hear,

translation.en: [Bud] Wait, wait, wait, wait. I don't know what you people think you're doing.

看在上帝的份上 奥利

translation.en: Look, I'm gonna be taking down names, starting with you.

translation.en: And I am prepared to file a police report.
Fine, Bud, write down your names. I will.
translation.zh:
-好吧 巴德 你就记你的名吧
-我会的

translation.en: And in the meantime, shut the fuck up and listen.
translation.zh: 但同时 给我闭嘴 认真听我说
这位是大卫德雷顿先生

translation.en: You need to hear what he's got to say if you're thinking about leaving.

translation.en: Go hang out with the ladies, all right?

translation.en: Now, I don't know what this mist is,
translation.zh: 现在我不知道那迷雾究竟是什么

translation.en: but there are things in it, and they're dangerous, like Dan said.
translation.zh:
但在里面有东西
很危险 正如丹所说的那样

translation.en: I never saw it, it happened too fast.

translation.en: Five us went back in the loading dock.
translation.zh: 我们五个人去了卸货区

translation.en: It was Jim, Myron, Ollie, me,

translation.zh: 我 诺姆 那个搬货男孩

-我们打开了门…
-诺姆在哪？ 诺姆要出去给发电机清理通风口

translation.en: So Norm could go out and clear the vent for the generator.
translation.zh: 诺姆要出去给发电机清理通风口

translation.en: Something came out of the mist and took him.

translation.en: Took him? What do you mean?
Now, guys, I don't know what these things are.
translation.zh: 大家… 我不知道那些到底是什么
我们看到的就只是些触脚

translation.en: No, it's a lie, you know.
All these people do is just lie each other up.

translation.en: Of course it's a lie, of course it's a lie,
And from the look of it, the tentacles are coming out of the beer cans.

translation.en: All right, Bud, don't take our word for it.
translation.zh: 好吧 巴德 别曲解我们的话

translation.en: It appears we may have a problem of some magnitude here.
translation.zh: 看来我们有个大麻烦了
让我… 让我宣扬祢的话语
因为他们并不都是坏人

translation.en: Some can be saved, can't they?
translation.zh: 有些是可以被拯救的 不是吗？

translation.en: Yes, some can be brought to heaven's holy gates
translation.zh: 是的 有些人可以通过祢的恩典

translation.en: though I know most people swim in a lake of fire forever.

虽然我知道大多数人
都将在火湖中永世煎熬

translation.en: If I can save a few, even one,
translation.zh: 如果我能挽救那么几个…

translation.en: then my life will have counted for something.
translation.zh: 那我的生命便也有意义了

translation.en: I will have pulled my weight,
I will have earned my place at your side,
I will have served a purpose here on this earth.
translation.zh:
我来这世上 -只为完成一个使命
-有人吗？

translation.en: I just need to use the bathroom.
Okay, well then, have at it.
Ma'am, I just want you to know that it's okay,
translation.zh: 夫人… 只是想对你说 没关系的…

translation.en: And, well, if you need a friend, you know,
translation.zh: 如果你需要朋友的话 找个人聊聊

translation.en: I have a friend, God up above.
I talk to him every day.
translation.zh: 天上的主 我每天都同他谈心

translation.en: That's not what I was doing.
The day I need a friend like you,
translation.zh: 当我需要像你这样的朋友时

translation.en: I'll just have myself a little squat and shit one out.
translation.zh: 我只要蹲下拉出屎就可以了
也许你们真的相信这个

translation.en: maybe they're not lies, they're delusions, whatever.

translation.en: The fact remains the evidence here is flimsy,
translation.zh: 就现状来说 证据并不充分

translation.en: it's bordering on ludicrous. Hey, this isn't a court room.
and you're doing nothing but damage talking the way you are.
translation.zh: 而用你的方式说话只会造成伤害

translation.en: And you can throw as much cow's blood around the loading dock as you want to,
translation.zh: 你们要把多少牛血扔到卸货区都可以
你永远叫不醒装睡的人

translation.en: there's a fire even when their hair is burning.
translation.zh: 你永远叫不醒装睡的人 哪怕已经火烧眉毛了

translation.en: I'll have no part of it, nor would any thinking person.
translation.zh:
我才不会上当
任何会思考的人都不会
继续思考吧 律师先生

translation.en: There's no defense against the will of God.
translation.zh: 上帝的旨意是无法抵抗的

translation.en: There's no court of appeals in hell.

translation.zh: 这里也没什么好辩驳的

translation.en: not even with all the fertilizer in the world.
translation.zh: 就算有全世界最多的肥料

translation.en: Not even if you stack it as high as you can,
translation.zh: 就算你把它们堆得再高也没用

translation.en: it's still just bags of shit, isn't it?
translation.zh: 最终还是一堆屎 对吧？

translation.en: Those of you who want to discuss this thing rationally
translation.zh:
如果有人想理性讨论
这件事 想找出自救办法

translation.en: to find a means of rescue are welcome to join me.
Those who want to stack dog food, knock yourselves out.
translation.zh: 那些想堆狗粮的人 随你们的便

translation.en: We got those windows taped up as best we could,
translation.zh: 我们已经把窗户用胶带封好了

translation.en: Duct tape and dog food bags.
There's none so blind as those who will not see.
translation.zh:
最瞎的不是盲人
是那些不愿意正视现实的人

translation.en: "And the temple was filled with smoke
from the glory of God, and from his power.
translation.zh: 来自上帝的荣耀 以及他的神力

translation.en: And no one could enter the temple
until the seven plagues of the seven angels were completed."
translation.zh: 直到那七位天使所降的七灾结束”

translation.en: That we all prepare to meet our maker.

translation.zh: 去见我们的缔造者 准备去见鬼吧！

translation.en: Lady, your tongue must be hung in the middle
translation.zh: 女士 你的舌头一定吊在中间了

translation.en: so that it could waggle at both ends.
translation.zh: 这样它才能在两端摆动

translation.en: No, the end time has come.
Not in flames, but in mist. Come here!
translation.zh:
-不是在火焰里 而是在迷雾中
-过来！

translation.en: How about if your ass prepares to meet
translation.zh:
不如这样 让你的屁股
来见见我的十号工作靴

translation.en: my size 10 work boot, how bout that?
translation.zh:
不如这样 让你的屁股
来见见我的十号工作靴 怎么样？

translation.en: Hey, there's no call for that.
Yeah, Myron, please, calm your friend down.
translation.zh: 麦伦 拜托 让你的朋友冷静一下

translation.en: [Mrs. Carmody] I'm trying to save your soul, you stupid man. Doubters will doubt till the end.
translation.zh: 我是想挽救你的灵魂 你个蠢货

-怀疑者死都不会悔改
-没事的

translation.en: A monstrosity did pull that poor boy away.
translation.zh:
-不 我很抱歉
-一个怪物 确实把那个可怜的孩子拖走了

translation.en: Things in the mist. Do you doubt?
translation.zh: 迷雾中的东西… 你们怀疑吗？

translation.en: Go out and say "How do you do?"
Look, you'll have to stop now, you're scaring the children.
translation.zh: 你真的需要住口 你让孩子们害怕
对 他们应该这样的

translation.en: have been corrupted with lies, lies.
translation.zh: 已经被谎言吞噬了 谎言 全都信奉现代神了

translation.en: All this talk of a modern God, or no God.
translation.zh: 谎言 全都信奉现代神了 甚至无神论
世上是有一位神存在的

translation.en: And he is a stern and vengeful God.
translation.zh: 他是一个严厉、复仇心重的神

translation.en: And we have been mocking him far too long.
translation.zh: 而我们已经亵渎他太长时间了

translation.en: And now he demands retribution and blood.
translation.zh: 今天他要让我们以血偿还

translation.en: It is time to declare yourselves.
translation.zh: 是时候表明你们自己了

translation.en: Take sides, the saved and the damned.
translation.zh: 选择吧 受宽恕还是被诅咒

translation.en: Read the Good Book, it calls for expiation, blood!
translation.zh:
读读圣经 它宣扬的是救赎 -血祭！
-什么？

translation.en: and now God calls the rest of us.
translation.zh: 现在上帝来在召唤剩下的人了

translation.en: As Abraham prepared to sacrifice his only son
translation.zh: 正如亚伯拉罕准备牺牲他的独生子

translation.en: to prove his love for God, so...
translation.zh: 来证明他对神的爱 所以…

translation.en: A few more pennies in the jar.
Now that's nice. See, I can't smack her, but it's okay for you?
translation.zh: 真不错 我没办法扇她 但你可以

translation.en: I'm sorry everybody, but this lady's perspective
translation.zh:
很抱歉 各位 但这位女士的观点
对我来说太像《旧约》

translation.en: is a little too Old Testament for my tastes.
translation.zh:
但这位女士的观点
对我来说太像《旧约》
也许是今晚 当黑暗来临时

translation.en: And when they do, you will cry to God,
translation.zh: 一旦来了 那时你就对着神哭喊吧

translation.en: and you will beg Mother Carmody to show you the way.
translation.zh: 你会请求卡莫迪圣母给你指条明路

translation.en: Until then if you don't shut up,
translation.zh: 但在那之前 如果你再不闭嘴

translation.en: I'll wrap this tape around your mouth.
translation.zh: 我会用这卷胶带封住你的嘴

translation.en: You just try it, Ollie Weeks.
translation.zh: 有种来啊 奥利威克斯

translation.en: You hit me again, if you dare.
You'll be on your knees to me before this is through.
translation.zh:
在这结束之前
你一定会跪在我面前求我

translation.en: Those of you who aren't locals should know
that Mrs. Carmody is known in town for being unstable.
translation.zh: 卡莫迪夫人在镇上是出了名的… 情绪不稳定

translation.en: How come your friends don't come get us?
translation.zh: 你们的朋友怎么没来救我们？

translation.en: They got tanks and stuff, right?
translation.zh: 他们有坦克什么的 对吧？

translation.en: But don't you got like a radio?
I want their friends to come rescue us.
translation.zh: 我想让他们的朋友来救我们

translation.en: They would if they could, pal, they're stuck here just like us.
translation.zh:
他们也无能为力 孩子
他们也是一样被困在这了

translation.en: Guys, we could use a hand over there.
Yeah, sure thing. Troop, off your asses.
translation.zh:
-没问题
-士兵们 该抬抬屁股了

translation.en: You all right? I don't like that scary lady.
translation.zh:
-还好吗？
-我不喜欢那个可怕的女人

translation.en: I'm sorry about the times I was bad to her.
translation.zh: 我为我曾经对她不好感到后悔

translation.en: And I promise you, I'm gonna do everything I can
translation.zh: 我答应你 我会尽我所能让我们回到她身边

translation.en: to get us back to her.
translation.zh: 我会尽我所能让我们回到她身边

translation.en: So we can use the charcoal fluid and the mops to make torches,
translation.zh: 我们可以用煤油加拖把 做成火把

translation.en: and we've got knives and stuff, God knows.
translation.zh: 还有我们这里有刀什么的

translation.en: This may be a silly question, Bud,
translation.zh: 这可能是个比较蠢的问题 巴德

translation.en: but do you happen to have a gun in the store?
translation.zh: 这可能是个比较蠢的问题 巴德 但是你们有备支枪放在店里吗？

translation.en: I've got a shotgun in my truck.
I could try for it if you want.
translation.zh: 如果你想要的话 我可以试着拿来

translation.en: Oh God, I don't think that would be a good idea, Mr. Cornell.
translation.zh:
天啊 我觉得
这不是个好主意 康奈尔先生

translation.en: This gun, uh, my husband's idea.
translation.zh: 这里有把枪 我丈夫的主意

translation.en: He's away on business a lot.

translation.zh: 没上膛的话也没啥用 夫人

translation.en: You know how to use that?
Well, I shot it once on a pistol range,
hit the target a few times.
Anybody know how to shoot it?
Hey, you're crazy if you go out there. Let us pass!
translation.zh:
-你要是出去就是疯了！
-让我们过去！

translation.en: Let's just talk this thing through.
[Norton] We have, and we made our decision.
translation.zh:
-我们好好谈谈吧
-我们 我们已经做了决定 我们要离开
我们已经做了决定 我们要离开

translation.en: Hey, Mr. Mackey's gonna barbecue some chicken on the gas grill.
translation.zh: 麦基先生要在煤气炉上烤些鸡肉

translation.en: Why don't we just sit down and- What, and let you keep on talking?
translation.zh:
-不如我们坐下来再…
-什么让你继续在那演讲？

translation.en: No, I've been in far too many court rooms to fall for that.
translation.zh: 不 我已经在法庭上听得太多了

translation.en: You've already psyched out half a dozen of my people already.
translation.zh: 你已经吓到我这边六个人了

translation.en: What kind of talk is that? They are people, that's all.
translation.zh:
你这是什么话？
他们是他们自己的 仅此而已

translation.en: We are experiencing some kind of disaster.
translation.zh: 我们正经历一场大灾难

translation.en: I don't know whether it's man-made or natural,
translation.zh: 我不确定到底是人为还是自然

translation.en: but I do know that it's definitely not supernatural,
translation.zh: 但是我敢确定那绝不是什么超自然

translation.en: or Biblical. And no offense, Mrs. Carmody,
translation.zh: 或救赎之类 无意冒犯 卡莫迪夫人

translation.en: but the only way we're gonna help ourselves
translation.zh: 但我们唯一自救的方法

translation.en: Brent, look. I'm not discussing this any further.
translation.zh:
-布伦特 听着
-我不打算再讨论这事了

translation.en: I just want to ask a favor.
Tie this around your waist. What for?
It'll let us know you got at least 300 feet.
translation.zh:
它能让我们知道
你们至少走出90米外

translation.en: Are you throwing in with them?
I think your man there's a little too tightly wound.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得你那老兄有点太紧张了

translation.en: I'm thinking we could use that shotgun of yours.
translation.zh: 但我想我们会用得到你的猎枪

translation.en: I saw where you parked when I pulled in.
translation.zh: 我停车时刚好看到你停车的地方
红色小卡车 对吧 在较远的入口处

translation.en: The shells are in the glove compartment, drive it back.
translation.zh: 子弹在副驾驶杂物箱里 开车回去

translation.en: Just see they're paying out this line.
translation.zh: 只要看着他们慢慢放绳子就好

translation.en: Line's up, I'll cut her loose.
translation.zh: 绳子放完 我就会剪断

translation.en: You sure there's no way I can talk you out of this?
translation.zh: 真的没办法劝你放弃吗？

translation.en: Then I guess the joke would be on me after all.
You'll die out there, all of you.
translation.zh: 你们会死在外面 全部都会

translation.en: Hey, crazy lady. I believe in God too,
translation.zh: 疯婆子 我也信仰上帝

translation.en: I just don't think he's the bloodthirsty asshole
translation.zh: 我只是不认为 他是你说的那种

translation.en: you make him out to be.
Well, you take that up with the devil when you run into him.
translation.zh: 带着你的观点去跟魔鬼说吧

translation.en: Just chat it over at your leisure.
translation.zh: 没事的时候跟他好好聊聊

translation.en: Well, let's strike out toward the center of town.
translation.zh: 我们出发吧 直奔镇中心

translation.en: Pull! Back up, back up, back up!
About a half hour of daylight left.
translation.zh: 还有半个小时就天亮了

translation.en: Guys, how's it going with these work lights?
translation.zh: 大伙们 这些工作灯怎么样了？

translation.en: We're getting them rigged up, all right.
All right, all right, save it, save it.

translation.zh: 这些电池都是没充饱的

translation.en: If you turn the lights on, it's gonna drain them quick.
translation.zh: 开着灯会让电耗得更快

-多快？
-五分钟 或许十分钟

translation.en: If something gets in the store.
translation.zh: 如果有东西闯进来的时候

translation.en: Holy Jesus, you scared the shit outta me.
translation.zh: 天啊 你把我吓死了
萨利 抱歉 真的

translation.en: I thought I'd come in and say hi and see how you were holding up.
translation.zh: 我想进来打个招呼 看看你还好吗

translation.en: I'm worried about my folks, I guess.
You know, they live up on Shorham Road,
that's less than 5 miles from here.
Oh, they're out of town right now.
They're at my aunt's in Boston, so.
translation.zh: 他们在波士顿的阿姨那里 所以…

translation.en: That's lucky. That means they're okay.
translation.zh: 真幸运啊 那就是说他们都很好

translation.en: How come you never asked me out?
translation.zh: 为什么你从来不约我出去？

translation.en: We flirted all through high school, I know you like me.
translation.zh:
中学时 我们一直
都在暧昧 我知道你喜欢我

translation.en: I just didn't really want it to happen like this, you know?
translation.zh: 我只是不想现在这样 明白吗？

translation.en: Some shitty locker room at work.
Can we just stay in here a while then?
translation.zh: 那我们能在这待一会儿吗？

translation.en: The parking lot lamps turned on.
Must be a different one that's live.
translation.zh: 应该是另外一根有电的线吧

translation.en: [Dan] Maybe we could tie into them somehow.
translation.zh: 也许我们能牵根线过去

translation.en: That would mean walking out the door.
Not like any I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 和我见过的完全不一样

translation.en: [Mrs. Carmody] "They came out of the smoke.
And unto them was given power,
even as the scorpions of the earth have power."
translation.zh: 如同地球上的蝎子一样”

translation.en: Myron, get the ones in the back.
translation.zh: 麦伦 把后面的灯也打开！

translation.en: God, I think they're attracted to the light.
translation.zh: 我觉得它们被灯光吸引过来了

translation.en: Look out, look out, look out!
[Mrs. Carmody] "And there come a voice from the temple,
Go your ways, and pour out the vials
translation.zh: ‘你们去吧 把盛着上帝忿怒的瓶子倒在地上’”

translation.en: of the wrath of God upon the earth."
translation.zh: 把盛着上帝忿怒的瓶子倒在地上’”

translation.en: Ollie, the glass is gonna give!
translation.zh: 奥利 这块玻璃撑不住了！

translation.en: [Ollie] Oh my God, they turned on all the lights.

translation.zh: 点火 火把 把灯都熄了！

translation.en: Let me see, let me see sweetheart, let me see.
No, you're gonna be okay, you're gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 不会的 你会没事的

translation.en: Let me see, let me see.
You're fine, you're gonna be okay, you're gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 你没事 你会没事的

translation.en: Gimme the lighter, for the fire!
translation.zh: 把打火机给我！点火！ 快！
该死 这是儿童安全型的！

translation.en: I can't, I'll smash the window!
translation.zh: 不行！那会把玻璃也击碎！

translation.en: Ollie, you want these lights on or off? Leave them on!
translation.zh:
-奥利 这些灯开还是关？
-开着

translation.en: Bring torches! We need something to keep 'em out!
translation.zh: 拿火把！找东西把它们赶出去！

translation.en: Get it, get it, get it!
Bring torches! We need torches at the window!
translation.zh: 拿火把 窗户这边需要火把！

translation.en: My life for you, your will be done.
Did we get 'em? Did we get 'em all?
translation.zh: 抓到牠们了吗？我们都抓住了吗？

translation.en: She said that it would happen like this.
She said that they would come at night.
translation.zh: 她说过它们会在晚上袭击我们

translation.en: She told us someone would die.
It's okay, it's just a dream.
I know, of course you do.
translation.zh: 我知道 你肯定很想你妈妈

translation.en: Shh. I want to go home.
Everything will be better in the morning.
translation.zh: 到早上一切都会好起来的

translation.en: Well, I hate that I had to lie to him.
I always wanted to, but things haven't been working out.
translation.zh: 我一直想要孩子 但是事情并不是那么顺利

translation.en: Right now I'm thinking maybe that's for the best.
translation.zh: 现在我想也许没生孩子是对的

translation.en: I saw creatures fly into the store tonight,
translation.zh: 今天晚上我看到一些东西飞到店里来

translation.en: I keep thinking I'm gonna wake up in a rubber room.
translation.zh: 我还以为我是在橡胶房里醒来呢

translation.en: We're all right there with you.
This isn't gonna end, is it?
translation.zh: 这还没有完 不是吗？
是乔 乔的情况恶化了
你觉得怎么样 兄弟？
不好 他的情况不好

translation.en: I didn't know anything could hurt like this.
translation.zh: 我从不知道有什么东西会痛成这样

translation.en: If you guys can't help me, you gotta end it, okay?
[Joe] You can't fuck with me on this, bro.
translation.zh: 你不能让我受这种罪 兄弟

translation.en: We're not there yet, okay? Please!
translation.zh:
-我们还没到那地步 好吗？
-拜托了！

translation.en: I just need you to hang in a little longer, okay?
translation.zh: 你再坚持一下 好吗？

translation.en: Stay with him, I'll be back.
translation.zh: 陪着他 我很快回来

translation.en: Hattie, I need to go to the bathroom, will you watch Billy?
translation.zh:
哈蒂 我要去洗手间
你看着比利一下好吗？

translation.en: The last of those bugs went away about four.
translation.zh:
大概四点的时候
最后一只虫子也飞走了

translation.en: If we don't get him on some serious antibiotics
translation.zh: 如果不给他弄点抗生素的话
他肯定会因感染而死的

translation.en: Plus he needs painkillers in the worst way.
translation.zh: 而且他极度需要止痛药

translation.en: All we've got here is liquor and aspirin.
translation.zh: 我们这里只有酒精和阿司匹林

translation.en: You thinking about going to the pharmacy next door?
Irene Reppler says they've got Silvadene.
translation.zh: 爱琳瑞普勒说那里有磺胺嘧啶银

translation.en: You know, the stuff they use in burn wards.
She knows where they keep it. Slow down.
You can't actually be thinking of doing this.
translation.zh: 你们不会真的想这么做吧

translation.en: We have to get out of here.
And what happens when one of those things decides to break through this window?
translation.zh:
如果那些东西
决定把窗子都打破怎么办？

translation.en: I'm talking one of the big ones, like the one that killed Norm.
translation.zh: 我指的是大的 杀死诺姆的那种

translation.en: Yeah, then the flaming torch idea didn't work so well, did it?
translation.zh: 火把也起不了作用 对吗？

translation.en: We almost burned the goddamn store down.
translation.zh: 我们差不多得把店烧了

translation.en: I don't know how long she was there like that,
translation.zh: 我不知道她那样多久了

translation.en: Well, we should hit the pharmacy first.
translation.zh: 我们… 要先去一趟药房

translation.en: We gotta bring back supplies for the injured.
translation.zh: 我们得给伤员弄点药回来

translation.en: I mean, if we don't, Joe Eagleton's gonna die,
translation.zh:
我们得给伤员弄点药回来 如果不去 乔伊格尔
就要死了 不能让这种事情发生

translation.en: and we can't let that happen.
translation.zh:
如果不去 乔伊格尔
就要死了 不能让这种事情发生

translation.en: Look, my Land Cruiser can hold eight people.
I say we drive south as far as the fuel takes us
translation.zh: 我想一直朝南面开 直到燃料耗尽

translation.en: and try to keep clear of this mist.
That's what I got. No, you can't mean it.
translation.zh:
-那是我的想法
-不 你不能这样做

translation.en: Not after what happened to Norton and his group.
translation.zh: 不能步诺顿和他们的后尘
不是的 阿曼达 想想看

translation.en: Norton got over 200 feet from this store,
that's how much rope played out.
I'm parked half that distance from here.
translation.zh: 我车停的地方只有这的一半

translation.en: But who knows how far this mist has spread.
translation.zh: 但谁知道这迷雾散播到多远？

translation.en: It could be the entire eastern seaboard.
translation.zh: 它可能已经遍布整个东海岸了

translation.en: Yeah, it could be the whole world for all we know,
translation.zh: 是呀 也可能遍布全世界了

translation.en: wouldn't make us any less dead, now would it?
translation.zh: 横竖都是一死 不是吗？

translation.en: We have 1 gun, how many rounds?
translation.zh:
我们只有一把枪 -多少发子弹？
-还剩十发

translation.en: Want another reason to get the hell outta here?
translation.zh: 想再听一个离开这的理由吗？

translation.en: I'll give you the best one.
She's our very own Jim Jones.
translation.zh: 她就是我们这里的吉姆琼斯

translation.en: I'd like to leave before people start drinking the Kool-Aid.
translation.zh: 我想在人们受她蛊惑之前离开这里

translation.en: The flakier people get, the better she's gonna look.
translation.zh: 人们越是恐惧 她的话就好像越正确

translation.en: No, I don't buy that. It's obvious she's nuts.
translation.zh: 不对 我可不信 明显她是个疯子
也许有小部份人信服她 但是…

translation.en: She's preaching to 'em right now. By noon, she'll have 4 more.
translation.zh: 她正给他们布道 到中午会再多四个

translation.en: By tomorrow night, when those things come back,
translation.zh: 到了明晚 当那些怪物再来

translation.en: and then we can start worrying about
translation.zh: 然后我们就得开始担心她会牺牲谁

translation.en: who she's gonna sacrifice to make it all better.
translation.zh: 然后我们就得开始担心她会牺牲谁 好让她们好过一点

translation.en: You don't have much faith in humanity, do you?
translation.zh: 你本来就不相信人性 对吧？
人本质上是善良的 是正派的

translation.en: My God, David, we're a civilized society.
translation.zh: 天啊 大卫 我们是一个文明社会

translation.en: Sure, as long as the machines are working and you can dial 9-1-1,
translation.zh:
当然 在这机器还在
正常运转时 而你还能拨打911

translation.en: but you take those things away, you throw people in the dark,
translation.zh: 但如果把这些拿走 把人扔进黑暗里

translation.en: you scare the shit outta them, no more rules.
translation.zh: 把他们吓得屁滚尿流 就不再有所谓的准则了

translation.en: You'll see how primitive they get.
translation.zh: 你会看到他们变得多么原始

translation.en: If you scare people badly enough,
translation.zh: 当你把他们吓怕了的时候

translation.en: you can get 'em to do anything.
translation.zh: 可以让他们做任何事情

translation.en: They'll turn to whoever promises a solution.
translation.zh: 只要谁承诺有出路或办法

translation.en: Ollie, please, back me up here?
As a species, we're fundamentally insane.
translation.zh:
但作为一个物种
我们从根本上来说是愚蠢的

translation.en: Put more than two of us in a room,
translation.zh:
如果房间内有
两人以上 我们就会选边站

translation.en: we pick sides and start dreaming up reasons
translation.zh:
如果房间内有
两人以上 我们就会选边站 然后开始编造理由互相残杀
然后开始编造理由互相残杀

translation.en: Why'd you think we invented politics and religion?
translation.zh:
你觉得我们为什么
要发明政治和宗教？

translation.en: Look, nobody has to decide anything now, okay?
translation.zh: 不是现在就下决定 好吗？

translation.en: I'll bring you back some comic books.
translation.zh: 我会给你带一些漫画回来

translation.en: I want you to stay here.
Daddy, Daddy, there are things out there.
translation.zh: 爸爸… 爸爸 外面有怪物

translation.en: Yeah. There's a lot less of them in the daytime.
translation.zh: 对 但白天会少很多

translation.en: They'll wait. They'll wait in the mist where you can't see them,
translation.zh:
他们会等
他们会在你看不见的迷雾中等待

translation.en: and then when you go and can't get back in,
translation.zh: 然后当你走了 就再也回不来了…

translation.en: they'll come and eat you up!
I'll be back and then I'm gonna take you home.
translation.zh: 我会回来 带你回家去

translation.en: If something happens, anything at all,
translation.zh: 如果发生了什么事 不管是什么

translation.en: You get your ass back in here, for your boy's sake.
translation.zh: 为了你的孩子 你爬也要爬回来

如果我有什么不测
我想让你来照顾比利

translation.en: I want you to take care of Billy as best as you can,
translation.zh:
如果我有什么不测
我想让你来照顾比利 尽你所能 能多久就多久
尽你所能 能多久就多久

translation.en: The Land Cruiser is yours now.
You get him out of here, you just keep driving.
translation.zh: 你带他离开这里 一直往前开

translation.en: Where do you think you're going, Mr. David Drayton?
translation.zh: 要去哪呀？大卫德雷顿先生

translation.en: Are you so anxious to make your boy an orphan?
translation.zh: 就这么急着想让你儿子变成孤儿？

translation.en: My boy is no concern of yours.
translation.zh: 我的儿子不用你来操心

translation.en: We're gonna bring back some supplies.
translation.zh: 我们要弄一些药品回来

translation.en: Also, there may be people trapped over there who need help.
translation.zh: 还有可能有人被困在那里需要救助
听着 各位 听好！

translation.en: We're not gonna take any chances.
translation.zh: 我们不是要冒任何风险

translation.en: we'll come straight back here to the supermarket.
And bring the fiends of hell down on our heads, thank you.
translation.zh:
然后把地狱的恶魔
引到我们头上 谢谢啊
你们会让牠们注意到的

translation.en: Why can't you just leave well enough alone?
translation.zh: 为什么你们就不能好好待在这呢？

translation.en: Lady, is this what you call well enough?
translation.zh: 女士 这就是你说的“好好”吗？

translation.en: If you want to stop us,
you better explain to Bobby here
translation.zh: 你最好给博比解释一下

translation.en: why we're not bringing painkillers and medicine back for his brother.
translation.zh: 为什么我们不给他哥哥拿止痛药回来

translation.en: Even if I have to go alone.
translation.zh: 我去 就算只有我一个

translation.en: You'll die out there, young man.
translation.zh: 你会死在外面的 年轻人

translation.en: You'll walk out that door and be torn to shreds,
translation.zh: 你走出那扇门 会被撕成碎片的

translation.en: and then your hell-bound pride will have them come get the rest of us.
translation.zh:
然后你那见鬼的
傲慢 会让牠们来抓我们

translation.en: Yes, they'll come back for all of us, just like this good lady said.
translation.zh:
对 牠们会回来找我们
就像这位女士说的那样

他们蔑视我们

我们的价值观 我们的生活方式
